resources.string: Please input channel number or channel name.
This type has no channels. Please select other types.
New channels were found and added in the channel list.
You have entered a wrong password three times!\nPlease wait for about 15 minutes...
Already booked this program, cancel it?
is coming, change to the channel?
Do you want to capture the full screen or a special area?
Do you want to capture this screen?
Please select a position to save the logo.
Do you want to adjust the position of the special area?
No signal. The power will be turned off.
Do you want to stop CC and start Ginga Application?
Please DO NOT unplug the USB dongle and turn off the TV set during firmware updating!
Are you sure you want to update the firmware?
The firmware is successfully updated.\nPlease restart the TV set to activate the new firmware.
Failed to update.\nPlease restart the TV set to download the firmware again.
Failed to update.\nWould you like to retry?
Failed to update. Please insert the USB.\nWould you like to retry?
Available space of your USB dongle is not enough.
USB dongle is not ready, please plug it and try again.
Failed to download firmware from network.
There is some problem with the USB dongle.
Start to download new firmware from server
SUBTITLE must be closed before enabling digital TEXT. Agree to proceed?
Current CI MHEG-5 is running. Do you want to stop CI MHEG-5 and start HbbTV?
Current HbbTV is running. Do you want to stop HbbTV and start CI MHEG-5?
Current broadcast MHEG-5 is running. Do you want to stop broadcast MHEG-5 and start CI MHEG-5?
Current CI MHEG-5 is running. Do you want to stop CI MHEG-5 and start broadcast MHEG-5?
Do you want to switch to the EWS service?
Do you want to switch to the special service?
is coming, Do you want to switch to it?
Do you want to stop Ginga Application and open Closed Caption?
CI Plus Network has changed. You may search for updated network!
CI Plus Network is unavailable. You must search for updated network!
CI Plus Network is not initialized. You must search for updated network!
CI Plus Network search schedule time is reached. You may search for updated network!
You can select only one operator from the following list.
Please select satellites to scan or edit the selected satellite.
Please set DiSEqC 1.2 movement control\'s parameters.
Failed to find new software on the air.
This process may take up to 25 minutes
The software has been downloaded successfully. Do you want to start flashing?
Programming failed. Try it again?\n\nPlease call service center.
Software is downloaded successfully! Restart the TV now?
Warning: During the process, please do not unplug the TV Set power corde as this will lead to defective TV Set.
Software Update. A new recommended software update is available. The update might take some time and the screen might go black.Do not turn off TV during the update. Do you want to update now?
Unable to download the software. Do you want to retry?

Software Update. A new recommended software update is available. The update might take some time and the screen might go black.Do not turn off TV during the update. Do you want to update now?It will start automatically in %s second(s)

Software Update. A new recommended software will be available at %s. The update might take some time and the screen might go black. Do not turn off the receiver during the update. If you accept this update, please leave TV on or in standby mode at the scheduled time. Do you want to accept this update?

Software Update. A new recommended software update may exist in another channel. If you agree to download it, it may change to the channel automatically. Would you like to do it right now? It will start automatically in %s second(s)
New software is detected!\nDo you agree to auto download the software when the TV is in the standby mode?
Please set password."0000" is not a valid password
Some channels become inactive due to network change. Do you want to remove them now?
The TV channels have changed, press OK to scan for updates.
Satellite name is empty.\nPlease enter it!
The source conflicts with the %s source!
This content is blocked by your service provider.
Source not available,please change to DTV source
Popular songs, Japanese popular songs(enka songs)
Junior high school and high school students
Appendix information for BS/terrestrial digital broadcast program
Extension for broadband CS digital broadcasting
Extension for digital satellite sound broadcasting
The input source has been locked because of the input source locking defined by you. This can be changed via the TV menu. Press ENTER to unlock the screen.
Check the external input or select another input using the INPUT button.
No channels have been installed. Please scan channels via the TV menu.
The content is coming soon. Please wait a moment.
The channel is currently unavailable. Please contact your service provider for more information.
The channel only contains audio program.
The channel does not have video and audio content.
The channel data is being loaded. Please wait a moment.
The video format is not supported on the TV.
This content is stopped by your service provider.
There are no channels in the current channel list.
This content is blocked by your service provider.
The positioner is turning to locate the satellite. Please wait a moment.
There are no active channel services.
The content is coming soon. Please wait a moment.

"Select the channel ordering method. Automatic channel ordering is the default method. Pay TV ordering enables user presentation of channel numbers in a convenient form dedicated to Pay TV customers. Use Automatic channel ordering in case Pay TV ordering fails to install channels."
The clean screen service is started,will keep screen clean status in.%1$dminute
The clean screen service is stopped.
Are you sure you need to scan? All the installed channels will be removed.
